channel.title: Crappy demo
channel.description:
Here is a demo of my current build. Working on it right now. SRL is a cpu destroyer. Every random is called every loop. Geno is going to have to optimze it. This interface will be used by both scar and our up coming r-bot for color-clicking.
I am still working on it. Expect a closed beta.
It needs a better scar front-end and still has issue with keystroke with multi-applets. In the process of writing focus managers.
upload to toher places and post links plz http://rapidshare.de/files/22315978/suckyDemo.rar.html
Trackback:http://www.impsoft.net/viewtopic.php?t=106

item.title: Crappy demo
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Looks pretty good right now. Could probably use major improvements, but how should I know? I couldn’t see it so clearly on the demo and I know nothing about programming. So I’ll say great work, and happy cheating!
